bboxes.reason: Bounding box 1 correctly highlights the 'decrease_temp_setting_button,' focusing on the button area with the downward arrow and '-' sign, as it is the interactive region.

Bounding box 2 primarily encompasses the 'MODE' button's executable region, making it the most accurate choice for the pressing area. Bounding box 9 only covers the text label, which falls outside the button region, rendering it invalid.
Bounding box 3 captures the button labeled with an upward arrow and a '+' sign, which corresponds to the 'increase_temp_setting_button' identified on the appliance control panel.
The bounding box labeled 4 encloses the pressing area of the speed/uv button, which matches the criteria for selecting the button region, including the icon and label within a functional button.
The bounding box labeled 5 correctly captures the 'On/Off' button's pressing area, including the label. This is the control element specified.
Bounding box 6 best fits the timer_button element as it encompasses both the icon and the label on the button's pressing area, complying with the button selection criteria.
